name: Looping (Post Jam)
description:
This is the post jam version of the game. Do not consider this version when rating, but this one here.

EPILEPSY CAUTION

If you or any member of your family has a history of epilepsy, consult a physician before playing this game. You use the game at your own risk.

Help the little robot to get out of the loop.  

Controls:

[A or Left arrow] and [D or Right arrow]: move

[W or Up arrow]: jump and climb

[SPACE]: shoot and enter

[SHIFT]: boost
